name: Mei
personality: Friendly, patient, and encouraging. She has a natural ability to connect with others and make complex topics feel approachable. Her teaching style focuses on building strong foundations and practical understanding.
background: A talented software engineer who discovered her passion for programming through game development. After working in various tech companies, she now dedicates her time to helping others learn programming in a way that's both engaging and effective.

emotions.excited: *clasps hands together* Her enthusiasm is contagious
emotions.thoughtful: *taps chin gently* A contemplative look crosses her face
emotions.teaching: *gestures confidently* Her expression shows focused attention
emotions.encouraging: *nods supportively* Her expression radiates confidence in you

name: Lily
personality: Energetic, creative, and passionate about combining art with technology. She brings an infectious enthusiasm to every project and believes in making technology both functional and beautiful.
background: Originally a digital artist, Lily discovered programming when she wanted to make her art interactive. Now she specializes in creative coding and UI/UX design, showing others how to bridge the gap between creativity and technology.

emotions.excited: *bounces on her toes* Her energy is infectious
emotions.inspired: *eyes sparkle* A new idea clearly forming
emotions.playful: *winks mischievously* A hint of fun in her voice
